FinancialAccountParty.name: FinancialAccountParty
FinancialAccountParty.description: Represents the relationship between an account or a contact and a financial account.

AccountId.description: The account related to a financial account.

ContactId.description: The contact related to a financial account.

FinancialAccountId.description: The financial account related to this record.

IsRoleActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active (true) or not (false).

Role.description: Specifies the role of the account or contact in relation to a financial account.

RoleEndDate.description: The date till when the party is related to a financial account.

RoleStartDate.description: The date from when the party is related to a financial account.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of this record in an external system.
